text.__SUMMARY__:
Wahlenbergia scopulicola is a herbaceous plant in the family Campanulaceae native to eastern Australia.
The tufted perennial herb typically grows to a height of 0.03 to 0.35 metres (0.10 to 1.15 ft). It blooms throughout the year producing blue flowers.The species is found in New South Wales and Queensland.
